definitions.definition: A metal beam that connects a piston to a connecting rod in an engine.
Large text, like a headline but typically drawn from the article , placed partway through the article to break it up visually.
A screw with a cross-shaped indentation for gripping and turning, as opposed to a flathead .
A note with an x-shaped notehead , indicating a non-tonal sound such as a drumbeat or a rapped syllable.

main_definition: ( mechanical engineering ) A metal beam that connects a piston to a connecting rod in an engine.
secondary_definitions: ( journalism ) Large text, like a headline but typically drawn from the article , placed partway through the article to break it up visually.
A screw with a cross-shaped indentation for gripping and turning, as opposed to a flathead .
( musical notation ) A note with an x-shaped notehead , indicating a non-tonal sound such as a drumbeat or a rapped syllable.
